meanings.sent1: That dipshit forgot his keys again.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a dipshit and double-check your work.
meanings.sent3: The dipshit tried to microwave metal.
meanings.sent4: He's such a dipshit, he thought the moon was made of cheese.
meanings.sent5: The dipshit's actions spoke louder than words.

meanings.sent1: The dipshit spilled coffee all over the table.
meanings.sent2: I can't believe that dipshit won the lottery.
meanings.sent3: The dipshit thought the sun revolved around the Earth.
meanings.sent4: She's a dipshit when it comes to directions.
meanings.sent5: The dipshit's mistakes were legendary in the office.
